response.overview: We briefly experience with the animal protagnists their story, freely inspired by folk culture, in which good values conquer evil.  The film works with  a simple well known saying “A friend in need is a friend indeed“, making it accessible to viewers of any age or nationality.  This short animated fable “Criss-Cross“ is both a children’s film with a moral, and an attractive film for an adult viewer thanks to its artistic style, combining animation with a cross stitch embroidery.
response.title: Criss Cross
